string-array.item: The Player Summary page displays a quick glance of a player\'s performance for public and ranked games.

The Statistics Drawer has many more statistics available and only uses games that lasted more than five minutes. This is why the total number of games on the player summary page may not match the number of games displayed in the drawer.
KDA represents the player\'s average Kills, Deaths, and Assists per game.
K/D represents the player\'s average number of Kills divided by the average number of Deaths per game.
K+A/D represents the player\'s average number of Kills and Assists divided by the average number of Deaths per game.
The score values below are experimental. They are intended to give insight into the average skill of all players in a series of matches.
The CS Score represents the average combined CS (last hits + denies) for all players in each game.
The GPM Score represents the average combined GPM for all players in each game.
The XPM Score represents the average combined XPM for all players in each game.
The Composite Score is the combined total of the GPM and XPM Scores.
The Teamwork Score is the average number of people involved in each kill on the player\'s team.
